name: Quality Issue Recorded
query:
SELECT 
type_of_issue AS 'Issue Category:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(qb.type_of_issue) from `tabQuality Issue` qb where qb.type_of_issue = qi.type_of_issue AND workflow_state = 'Issue Closed' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) < 91) as 'Closed:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(qb.type_of_issue) from `tabQuality Issue` qb where qb.type_of_issue = qi.type_of_issue AND workflow_state = 'Pending for Physical Verification Officer Approval' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) < 91) as 'Pending with Physical verification officer:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(qb.type_of_issue) from `tabQuality Issue` qb where qb.type_of_issue = qi.type_of_issue AND workflow_state = 'Pending for Finance Team Approval' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) < 91) as 'Pending with Finance Team:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(qb.type_of_issue) from `tabQuality Issue` qb where qb.type_of_issue = qi.type_of_issue AND workflow_state = 'Pending for Quality Head Approval' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) < 91) as 'Pending with Quality Head:Data:250'
FROM
`tabQuality Issue` qi
GROUP BY
type_of_issue
UNION
select 'Grand Total', CAST(sum(qi.workflow_state = 'Issue Closed') AS int), CAST(sum(qi.workflow_state = 'Pending for Physical Verification Officer Approval') AS int), CAST(sum(qi.workflow_state = 'Pending for Finance Team Approval') AS int), CAST(sum(qi.workflow_state = 'Pending for Quality Head Approval') AS int) from `tabQuality Issue` qi;
